description: You can customize the TeamsFx config for different environments. Visit https://aka.ms/teamsfx-env-config to learn more about this.

description.short: Sample bot that retrieves MSFT stock data from the Alpha Vantage API
description.full: Sample bot that retrieves MSFT stock data from the Alpha Vantage API on a scheduled, which is triggered every thirty seconds and sends an Adaptive Card to where the bot has been installed.
